content: this legal document is about a divorce case it includes the case number and the date of the divorce agreement the document is signed by a notary public mr has confirmed his unmarried status and current address mrs has confirmed her cohabitation status and provided details about her previous marriage and divorce the document also explains the progress of a property division the property is jointly owned and described as a dwelling house with land and a garage the value of the property is estimated to be 385000â‚¬ one party has received 15102037â‚¬ as agreed upon in a previous arrangement which is subject to the condition of the divorce being finalized the parties also request a reduction in registration fees the conditions for the division surrender have been met and a deed will be registered the parties have chosen their residence for the execution of the deed and their marital status has been confirmed by the notary the parties have granted a power of attorney to certain notaries for tax declarations related to the deed they have been informed that they can access the document online after reading and explanation the parties have signed and the notary has certified the copies
